data.fullContent: Perhaps, if the goal is to develop clear and logical thought in general, it would be better to study texts specifically designed to do so rather than to study mathematics where what is desired is merely as useful side effect. But it is certain that the correct use of reasoning is at the core of modern mathematics, especially in the construction of proofs. This insistence on the use of logic as the basis of mathematics has not only help steer the subject away from incorrect results, but has guided it in the discovery of new areas of knowledge whose existence no one could have predicted otherwise.
data.answer: 也许，如果我们的目标是在总体上培养清晰的逻辑思维，那么最好是学习专门为此设计的文本，而不是学习数学，因为数学所要求的只是有用的副作用。但可以肯定的是，正确使用推理是现代数学的核心，尤其是在证明的构造中。坚持把逻辑作为数学的基础，不仅有助于使这门学科避开不正确的结果，而且还引导它发现了新的知识领域，这些领域的存在是没有人能够预料到的。
